methods.name: GetLifetimeReplicatedProps
methods.comment: Decide on what properties to replicate

methods.name: RollResourceType
methods.comment: Determine what type of resource node this is by a random factor

methods.name: TrySetDesiredResourceType
methods.comment: Tries to up the resource type to be the one specified in override variable

methods.name: SetupResourceInfo
methods.comment: Sets up all the data for this node

methods.name: ExtractResourceAndGiveToPlayer
methods.comment: Gives one resource to a player

methods.name: PlayDepletedEffect
methods.comment: Function used to play effects and change mesh when a deposit is emptied

methods.name: GetMineAmount
methods.comment: How much to mine per cycle

methods.name: OnRep_ResourceDepositEmptied
methods.comment: Called on client when resource deposit has been emptied

properties.name: mResourceDepositPackage
properties.comment: Valid if mLootTableIndex is not INDEX_NONE

properties.name: mResourceDepositTableIndex
properties.comment: Index in the resource deposit table

properties.name: mMineAmount
properties.comment: How much to mine per cycle

properties.name: mDepositMeshComponent
properties.comment: The mesh we use for displaying the resource deposit
